subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The Tigers’ Miguel Cabrera has been even better than he was last season, when he won the triple crown. He also plays for a winning team, as does the Pirates’ Andrew McCutchen.
snippet: The Tigers’ Miguel Cabrera has been even better than he was last season, when he won the triple crown. He also plays for a winning team, as does the Pirates’ Andrew McCutchen.
